name: Kunal Shah
position: xto10x Technologies | Urban Ladder | IIM Indore
about: As a services lead at xto10x, I help startups scale and succeed by providing them with data-driven insights, best practices, and strategic guidance. I have over eight years of experience in the fields of strategy, retail, and fintech, working with leading companies such as ZestMoney and Urban Ladder. I have a PGDM from IIM Indore and a B.Tech in Computer Science from Nirma University. I have strong analytical skills, team management skills, and market research skills, which I apply to deliver impactful solutions and outcomes for my clients. I am passionate about solving complex problems, creating value, and driving growth and innovation in the startup ecosystem. I thrive in a collaborative and dynamic environment, where I can leverage my diverse perspectives and experiences to contribute to the mission and vision of xto10x.
